title: DevOps Engineer II
experience: Continued my role as a Facilitator for the DevOps Community of Practice

title: Software Engineer II
experience: I am in a cross platform team that is implementing and developing DevOps practices across many of the Enterprises products, old and new.
Automating tool sets for development and operation teams with container based architecture.
Implementation of gitflow and GitOps within the pipelines.
I have helped with the design and architecture of the stages in a Jenkins Continuous Integration, Delivery, Deployment pipeline.
Practice of microservice architecture using Springboot applications.
I was on the team that started the DevOps CoP (Community of Practice), I am a presenter and a community moderator. I have a key role in finding presenters and facilitating the presentations.

title: Software Test Analyst
experience: Created automated regression testing framework for QA teams.
Testing framework was built upon Protractor using Cucumber as a testing tool.
Scripts would run in Jenkins via a git trigger.
Testing environment would run upon containerized clusters in Openshift
CI/CD pipeline script would dynamically create a Selenium Grid with parallel execution of tests on multiple types of browsers.
Results were then published to a test tracking tool via API request.
